title: About SSW EagleEye - Transform Company Data into Epic Insights

featureItem.headline: About us
featureItem.text:
SSW EagleEye is an AI-powered insights platform that turns everyday team activity into clear, actionable intelligence. By analyzing email and collaboration patterns, it highlights productivity trends, workload distribution, and communication bottlenecks, helping leaders understand how work really flows across their organization.

 Built with security and scalability in mind, EagleEye runs on Azure and keeps data under the customerâ€™s control. With automated reporting, Power BI integration, and a growing roadmap of Microsoft 365 and developer-tool insights, it supports data-driven decisions without adding overhead to teams.

pageBlocks.headline: Talk to an EagleEye Expert
pageBlocks.text: Evaluating EagleEye for your company? Book a 30-minute call with a EagleEye specialist and see a demo!
